item.title: An R package to retrieve Vietnam stock data
item.description: This is my simple package that allow user to get the Vietnam stock data from cafef.vn and vndirect. This package is the wrap around of httr package to send request to these two data source and parse the respond to R data frame (tibble). You can browse the package source code here Install To install this package, use: devtools::install_github("https://github.com/vohai611/vnstockr") Usage This package only contain two function get_cafeF() and get_vndirect(). User just need to specify stock code (symbol) and time frame.
